channel.title: XAPI's Storage Layers :: XAPI Toolstack Developer Documentation
channel.description: Info The links in this page point to the source files of xapi v1.127.0, and xcp-idl v1.62.0, not to the latest source code. In the beginning of 2023, significant changes have been made in the layering. In particular, the wrapper code from storage_impl.ml has been pushed down the stack, below the mux, such that it only covers the SMAPIv1 backend and not SMAPIv3. Also, all of the code (from xcp-idl etc) is now present in this repo (xen-api).
